thread.title: NIGEL KETTLEWELL

author: NIGEL KETTLEWELL
title: NIGEL KETTLEWELL
text: I ordered via the web page 16" alloys they were out of stock I was contacted via phone to as if I would like the 17" at no extra cost. All went smoothly from there delivery was as expected the wheels look fantastic locking nuts with the order I couldn't ask for better service. I would recommend & purchase more wheels from them should I require them
